sense.gloss: very, greatly, much, considerably, to a large extent, quite
just about to, almost, very nearly

sdata.j: ↑喜色↑↓きしょく↓↑満面↑↓まんめん↓の↑笑↑↓え↓みを↑浮↑↓う↓かべているけど、↑彼↑↓かれ↓、|よっぽど|↑嬉↑↓うれ↓しいことがあったんだろうな。
sdata.e: You could tell by the ear-to-ear grin that came to his face that he really had something to smile about.

sdata.j: |よっぽど|↑印象↑↓いんしょう↓に↑残↑↓のこ↓る↑事↑↓こと↓じゃないと↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えてないんだよね。
sdata.e: Unless it's something fairly impressive, I won't remember it.

sdata.j: あいつがガッツポーズするなんて、|よっぽど|↑嬉↑↓うれ↓しかったんだろうな。
sdata.e: It must have been something really big for him to strike a triumphant pose like that.

sdata.j: 「またチョコ↑食↑↓た↓べてる。|よっぽど|↑好↑↓す↓きなんだね」「うん、↑大好↑↓だいす↓き」「じゃあチョコとうちではどっちが↑好↑↓す↓き？」「そんなのチョコに↑決↑↓き↓まってんじゃん」
sdata.e: You're eating chocolate again. You really like that stuff, don't you? "Yep, I love it!" "OK, well, which do you like better? Chocolate, or me?" "You know the answer to that. Chocolate, of course."

sdata.j: ↑掃除↑↓そうじ↓って↑下手↑↓へた↓な↑筋↑↓きん↓トレより|よっぽど|↑筋力↑↓きんりょく↓つくよね。
sdata.e: Sweeping is better than poorly-done weight training for strengthening your muscles.
